alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:39AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Windham County through 1215 PM EDT... At 1139 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Guilford Center, or 10 miles southwest of Brattleboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brattleboro, Vernon, Guilford Center, Guilford, Whitingham, Marlboro, Halifax, Jacksonville, North Vernon, East Dummerston, Fairview Village, Four Corners, Dummerston Center, Putney Station, Green River, West Halifax, Whitneyville, West Dummerston, Grove and Harrisville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
